about_the_game:
Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13. All donations go directly towards our development fund and makes sure we can put out content as fast as possible!

*Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content and does not include any licenced works in any way or form.
detailed_description:
Donations?

Ofcourse donations are controversial at best. However all donations are publicized (anonymously) and expenditures are publicly logged on our discord! All donations will always go towards development and hosting.


About the Game

Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13. All donations go directly towards our development fund and makes sure we can put out content as fast as possible! *Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content and does not include any licenced works in any way or form.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.5ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)

name: Expedition 13  - Bronze Donator Package

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Same as Main game (No actual content included)

short_description: Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13.. All donations go directly towards our development fund and makes sure we can put out content as fast as possible! Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the some benefits.
